There are only 300+ sentences you will most likely need. â¢Speaking mode and Listen mode available!! You can learn both Speaking and Listeningâ¢There is vocabulary part so that you can see how these sentences are made, and also you can create similar sentence by changing one particular word. â¢Native speaker recording. Clear and Perfect pronunciation &intonation. â¢Voice repeat count option.â¢Say German consists of twelve categories such as emergency, shopping, negotiation, and so on.â¢No need of additional download or internet connectionâ¢One Categories available(daily) for free version!!Speak German, Talk German, Learn to speak German, Listen German.
